post0.title: Success Stories
post0.content: . toc: true layout: post description: Success Stories of those who’ve come back to India and happy with it categories: [markdown] title: Success Stories – . . There are two sides to every story, here - we are cherry-picking just one side Thread/Tweetstorm . I quit my job at the Googleplex in 2015 after 7+ years in the Bay Area and moved to Bangalore with my wife.One big reason was the uncertainty and lack of flexibility on an H1B.The green card wait was 10+ years at that point.1/ https://t.co/skK6JSzRNG . — Muralidharan Venkatasubramanian (@_muralidharan_) June 25, 2020 Tweets . I can attest to this. Left my H1B and green card, came back to work with #Jio over 5 years ago. Couldn’t be happier. The impact you can have in this country is immense. It’s time to build, but for a Billion people. Come back Home, #MakeInIndia. . — Mayank Kapoor (@mayankkapoor) June 23, 2020

page1.title: About Me
page1.content: This is where you put the contents of your About page. Like all your pages, it’s in Markdown format. . This website is powered by fastpages 1. . a blogging platform that natively supports Jupyter notebooks in addition to other formats. ↩ . |

page2.content: . FAQ . How should I decide whether I am ready? . Here is a decision framework written by someone who came back home. . Can I talk to some people who’ve done this last few years? . Of course, here are some people. . Who maintains this? . NirantK . Latest .
